sections.title: Enrollment and Degree Verification
paragraphs: Illinois Institute of Technology has authorized the National Student Clearinghouse (NSC) to provide enrollment and degree verifications.

Enrollment verifications are self-service through our secure website and may only be accessed by currently enrolled students. Lenders download these reports from the clearinghouse. If your lender does not download clearinghouse reports, you can print your enrollment verification and mail it to your lender.
Clearinghouse reports are the national standard in enrollment reports to lenders. You can be assured that your enrollment will be reported every term in a timely manner.
steps: Search for "Enrollment Verification;" in the search tab click on the purple tree icon there and you will be directed to the clearinghouse website
Now in the clearinghouse student self-service site page, fill in the radio button for "All enrollment" and click on the "Obtain an enrollment certificate" option

sections.title: New Students: Update Your FERPA Choices
paragraphs: Update your choices regarding the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974 (FERPA) and the release of your records by completing theFERPA Release of Educational Recordsform.
